title: Start
body:
<<triggerSound CuedMusicStings musicTrackOne>>
<<showCharacter Allison true>>
<<showCharacter Ruby true>>
<<showCharacter Lance true>>
<<showCharacter Franklin true>>
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnIntroHey>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>> Welcome, everyone!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyIntroHey>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>> Glad to be here!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceNegativeComeOn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>> No you're not!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonSeriously>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>> Really, Lance?
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinUgh>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>> Aaaand, here we go...
<<fadeOutSound CuedMusicStings>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>> As I said before...
<<triggerSound CuedMusicStings musicTrackTwo>>
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX brynnIntroHey>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>> Welcome, everyone!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX rubyIntroHey>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>> Glad to be here!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX lanceNegativeComeOn>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>> No you're not!
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX allisonSeriously>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>> Really, Lance?
<<triggerSound VocalBarkSoundFX franklinUgh>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>> Aaaand, here we go...
